reviews.title: Awful!
reviews.text: After reading rave reviews in a couple of guidebooks we phoned to book a room in this "Luxury springs resort" in the small town of Montagu. On arrival we were greeted with a really unattractive building and a dingey reception area. The staff were really friendly and polite but this could not compensate for the actual hotel and we ended up checking out half an hour after checking in.
